attributes.action: Make it compulsory for 6-16 year olds to take part in 2 Hours of organized extra curricular activities per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Getting children from an early age to take part in extra curricular activites out side of school time, ie Youth clubs, Scouts, Sports, Cadets, Duke of Edinburgh`s Award, School Clubs etc will keep them off the streets from an early age, reducing boredom and street crime and ASB, It will also help to develop their personal skills and health.
